mapper.sql: id, user_id, farm_id, plant_id, create_time, res_time, send_time, finish_time, status, operator, phone, address
mapper.insert:
insert into cai_order
id,
user_id,
farm_id,
plant_id,
create_time,
res_time,
send_time,
finish_time,
status,
operator,
phone,
address,
#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{farmId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{plantId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{resTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{sendTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{finishTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{operator,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mapper.update:
update cai_order
user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
farm_id = #{farmId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
plant_id = #{plantId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
res_time = #{resTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
send_time = #{sendTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
finish_time = #{finishTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
operator = #{operator,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update cai_order set user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, farm_id = #{farmId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, plant_id = #{plantId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, res_time = #{resTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, send_time = #{sendTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, finish_time = #{finishTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, operator = #{operator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select count(*) from cai_order where `status` = 0 and plant_id = #{plantId}

select a.id as caiId, a.plant_id as plantId, c.title as `name`, a.create_time, c.img as caiImg, a.operator as operator, a.res_time as updateTime from cai_order as a join block_plant as b on a.plant_id = b.id join green as c on b.green_id = c.id where a.user_id = #{userId} and a.status = #{status}
